    • 方法详细资料

      • registerProcessDefinition

        public void registerProcessDefinition(java.lang.String token,
                             java.io.InputStream is)
                               throws ParseException,
                                      RepositoryException,
                                      WorkflowException,
                                      DatabaseException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkflowModule
        Register a new process definition in the workflow engine.
        指定者:
        registerProcessDefinition 在接口中 WorkflowModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        is - Input stream where process definition can be read.
        抛出:
        ParseException - If there is an error parsing the forms.xml file.
        RepositoryException - If there is a general repository error.
        WorkflowException - If there is any workflow engine error.
        DatabaseException - If there is a general database error.
        java.io.IOException

      • deleteProcessDefinition

        public void deleteProcessDefinition(java.lang.String token,
                           long processDefinitionId)
                             throws RepositoryException,
                                    DatabaseException,
                                    WorkflowException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkflowModule
        Delete a previously registered process definition.
        指定者:
        deleteProcessDefinition 在接口中 WorkflowModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        processDefinitionId - Process definition identifier.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is a general repository error.
        DatabaseException - If there is a general database error.
        WorkflowException - If there is any workflow engine error.

      • getProcessDefinition

        public ProcessDefinition getProcessDefinition(java.lang.String token,
                                     long processDefinitionId)
                                       throws RepositoryException,
                                              DatabaseException,
                                              WorkflowException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkflowModule
        Gets a process definition from the engine by the identifier.
        指定者:
        getProcessDefinition 在接口中 WorkflowModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        processDefinitionId - Process definition identifier.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is a general repository error.
        DatabaseException - If there is a general database error.

      • getProcessDefinitionImage

        public byte[] getProcessDefinitionImage(java.lang.String token,
                               long processDefinitionId,
                               java.lang.String node)
                                 throws RepositoryException,
                                        DatabaseException,
                                        WorkflowException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkflowModule
        Get a visual representation of the process definition.
        指定者:
        getProcessDefinitionImage 在接口中 WorkflowModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        processDefinitionId - Process definition identifier.
        node - Mark the designed node as active, if not null.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is a general repository error.
        DatabaseException - If there is a general database error.
        WorkflowException - If there is any workflow engine error.

      • getProcessDefinitionForms

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<FormElement>> getProcessDefinitionForms(java.lang.String token,
                                                                                    long processDefinitionId)
                                                                                      throws ParseException,
                                                                                             RepositoryException,
                                                                                             DatabaseException,
                                                                                             WorkflowException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkflowModule
        Obtain a map with the forms defined in the process definition.
        指定者:
        getProcessDefinitionForms 在接口中 WorkflowModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        processDefinitionId - Process definition identifier.
        抛出:
        ParseException - If there is an error parsing the forms.xml file.
        RepositoryException - If there is a general repository error.
        DatabaseException - If there is a general database error.
        WorkflowException - If there is any workflow engine error.

      • runProcessDefinition

        public ProcessInstance runProcessDefinition(java.lang.String token,
                                   long processDefinitionId,
                                   java.lang.String uuid,
                                   java.util.List<FormElement> variables)
                                     throws RepositoryException,
                                            DatabaseException,
                                            WorkflowException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkflowModule
        Run a process definition to create a process instance: begins a worflow process.
        指定者:
        runProcessDefinition 在接口中 WorkflowModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        processDefinitionId - Process definition identifier.
        uuid - Node identifier associated with the created process instance.
        variables - A list of form elements with variable definitions.
        返回:
        The created process instance.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is a general repository error.
        DatabaseException - If there is a general database error.
        WorkflowException - If there is any workflow engine error.
